div.em: Current conditions as of 29 Apr 05:53 am CDT

div.div: Showers likely after 8am. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 59. Northwest wind 9 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.

Showers likely, mainly before 1am. Cloudy during the early evening, then gradual clearing, with a low around 46. Northwest wind 14 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph. Chance of precipitation is 70%.
Sunny, with a high near 65. Breezy, with a northwest wind 16 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.
